verses.text: The word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that came to Micah the Morasthite in the days of Jotham , Ahaz , \add and\add* Hezekiah , kings of Judah , which he saw concerning Samaria and Jerusalem.

Hear , all ye people ; hearken , O earth , and all that therein is: and let the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* be witness against you, the Lord from his holy temple.\f + \fr 1.2 \ft all ye…: Heb. ye people, all of them\f*\f + \fr 1.2 \ft all that…: Heb. the fulness thereof\f*
For, behold, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* cometh forth out of his place , and will come down , and tread upon the high places of the earth.

And the mountains shall be molten under him, and the valleys shall be cleft , as wax before the fire , \add and\add* as the waters \add that are\add* poured down a steep place.\f + \fr 1.4 \ft a steep…: Heb. a descent\f*

For the transgression of Jacob \add is\add* all this, and for the sins of the house of Israel. What \add is\add* the transgression of Jacob ? \add is it\add* not Samaria ? and what \add are\add* the high places of Judah ? \add are they\add* not Jerusalem ?

Therefore I will make Samaria as an heap of the field , \add and\add* as plantings of a vineyard : and I will pour down the stones thereof into the valley , and I will discover the foundations thereof.

And all the graven images thereof shall be beaten to pieces , and all the hires thereof shall be burned with the fire , and all the idols thereof will I lay desolate : for she gathered \add it\add* of the hire of an harlot , and they shall return to the hire of an harlot. \p
Therefore I will wail and howl , I will go stripped and naked : I will make a wailing like the dragons , and mourning as the owls.\f + \fr 1.8 \ft owls: Heb. daughters of the owl\f*

For her wound \add is\add* incurable ; for it is come unto Judah ; he is come unto the gate of my people , \add even\add* to Jerusalem.\f + \fr 1.9 \ft her…: or, she is grievously sick of her wounds\f* \p
¶ Declare ye \add it\add* not at Gath , weep ye not at all : in the house of Aphrah roll thyself in the dust.\f + \fr 1.10 \ft Aphrah: that is, Dust\f*

Pass ye away , thou inhabitant of Saphir , having thy shame naked : the inhabitant of Zaanan came not forth in the mourning of Beth-ezel ; he shall receive of you his standing.\f + \fr 1.11 \ft thou…: or, thou that dwellest fairly\f*\f + \fr 1.11 \ft inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress\f*\f + \fr 1.11 \ft Zaanan: or, The country of flocks\f*\f + \fr 1.11 \ft Beth-ezel: or, A place near\f*

For the inhabitant of Maroth waited carefully for good : but evil came down from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto the gate of Jerusalem.\f + \fr 1.12 \ft inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress\f*\f + \fr 1.12 \ft waited…: or, was grieved\f*

O thou inhabitant of Lachish , bind the chariot to the swift beast : she \add is\add* the beginning of the sin to the daughter of Zion : for the transgressions of Israel were found in thee.\f + \fr 1.13 \ft inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress\f*

Therefore shalt thou give presents to Moresheth-gath : the houses of Achzib \add shall be\add* a lie to the kings of Israel.\f + \fr 1.14 \ft to…: or, for Moresheth-gath\f*\f + \fr 1.14 \ft Achzib: that is, A lie\f*

Yet will I bring an heir unto thee, O inhabitant of Mareshah : he shall come unto Adullam the glory of Israel.\f + \fr 1.15 \ft inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress\f*\f + \fr 1.15 \ft he…: or, the glory of Israel shall, etc\f*
Make thee bald , and poll thee for thy delicate children ; enlarge thy baldness as the eagle ; for they are gone into captivity from thee.
